## Project Context
Building PixelPantry - a gamified pixel-art pantry inventory tracker using Electron.
Features: Add/remove items, categorization, stock counting, visual changes based on stock levels.

## Project Complete âœ…

The PixelPantry Electron app is ready to use! Run with:
- `npm start` - Launch the app
- `npm run dev` - Launch with DevTools for debugging
